1.0.name: wordpress/videojug-oembed
1.0.description:
Videojug Oembed will easily enable the embedding of Videojug videos on your Wordpress Blog. Just written a great article on Indian cousine? Why not embed our extremely popular "How To Cook a Chicken Curry in Ten minutes" video featuring our wonderful Indian cousine expert. Blogging about the latest beauty tips? we have a great video that will revolutionise your reader's look!. Videojug contains thousands of expert how to films that cover every subject from "How to Tie a Tie" to "How To Perform the Perfect Golf Swing".

After you have installed this plugin all you need to do is copy the Video's URL and paste it in your blog. This will automatically embed your
